description.gold-silver:
Steals HP from a
sleeping victim.
description.crystal:
Steals HP from a
sleeping victim.
description.ruby-sapphire:
Takes one half the damage
inflicted on a sleeping foe.
description.emerald:
Takes one half the damage
inflicted on a sleeping foe.
description.firered-leafgreen:
Absorbs half the
damage it inflicted
on a sleeping foe
to restore HP.
description.diamond-pearl:
An attack that works
only on a sleeping
foe. It absorbs half
the damage caused to
heal the user’s HP.
description.platinum:
An attack that works
only on a sleeping
foe. It absorbs half
the damage caused to
heal the user’s HP.
description.heartgold-soulsilver:
An attack that works
only on a sleeping
foe. It absorbs half
the damage caused to
heal the user’s HP.
description.black-white:
The user eats the dreams of a sleeping
target. It absorbs half the damage
caused to heal the user’s HP.
description.black-2-white-2:
The user eats the dreams of a sleeping
target. It absorbs half the damage
caused to heal the user’s HP.
description.x-y:
The user eats the dreams of a sleeping
target. It absorbs half the damage
caused to heal its own HP.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire:
The user eats the dreams of a sleeping
target. It absorbs half the damage
caused to heal its own HP.
description.sun-moon:
The user eats the dreams of a sleeping target. It
absorbs half the damage caused to heal its own HP.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user eats the dreams of a sleeping target. It
absorbs half the damage caused to heal its own HP.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user eats the dreams of a sleeping target. It
absorbs half the damage caused to heal its own HP.
description.sword-shield:
The user eats the dreams of a sleeping target.
The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by
the target.

effect.full: Fails if not used on a sleeping Pokémon.  Inflicts regular damage.  Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
effect.shortEffect: Only works on sleeping Pokémon.  Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
